title: The Beast and the Beauty
description: Can a woman, cursed with the guise of a beast, charm a handsome prince into proposing marriage?Once the resplendent belle of the court, Sybil de la Roche is now struck with a curse, making her the most grotesque woman in the kingdom. To reclaim her lost beauty, she must secure a marriage proposal. However, after forty long years and twenty-eight rejections, she resolves to shatter the curse herself. But the arrival of a charismatic stranger stirs a tumult of hope and fear within her.Enter Prince Gerald, the most handsome man in Savony, on a mission to locate a long-lost mage. When a snowstorm maroons him at an isolated manor, he becomes intrigued by the enigmatic woman residing there. However, his attempts to know her are thwarted by her fierce determination to keep him at bay.To fully appreciate this sequel, we recommend first reading Book 1, Till Midnight, before setting forth on the journey of The Beast and the Beauty.
author: Arisa May
